overview.title: Overview
overview.description: We want you to be satisfied with every purchase. This policy explains how returns and refunds work, including timelines and eligibility requirements.

eligibility.title: Eligibility for Refunds
eligibility.description: To qualify for a refund, please ensure that:

items.condition: The item is unused, in original condition, and in original packaging.
items.timeline: A return request is submitted within 14 days of delivery unless stated otherwise.
items.proof: Proof of purchase (order number or receipt) is provided.
items.excluded: Items marked as final sale or non-returnable are excluded.

howToInitiate.title: How to Initiate a Return

steps.contact: Contact our support team with your order number and reason for return.
steps.ship: Ship the item using a trackable method; include all original accessories and tags.

howToInitiate.description: Once we receive and inspect the item, we will confirm approval or rejection of the refund.

items.method: Approved refunds are issued to the original payment method.
items.timing: Processing time is typically 5â€“10 business days after approval; bank timings may vary.
items.shipping: Shipping fees are non-refundable unless the return is due to our error or a defective item.

items.giftCards: Gift cards and digital products once delivered.
items.personalized: Personalized or custom-made items unless defective.
items.condition: Products not in original condition, damaged, or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
